title: Natalie Morris
itunes:title: Natalie Morris
itunes:subtitle: This week I’m talking to writer + journalist Natalie Morris about her Dad, who died last summer from cancer.
description:
This week I’m talking to writer + journalist Natalie Morris about her Dad, who died last summer from cancer. As ever we talk grief, hospices + coping with death during lockdown


Natalie is on Instagram @nmozz and you can follow Griefcast on Twitter and Instagram @TheGriefcast


Griefcast is hosted by Cariad Lloyd, edited by Kate Holland, recorded at Whistledown Studios (or Cariad's living room in lockdown), artwork is by Jayde Perkin and the music is provided by The Glue Ensemble. And remember, you are not alone.


Rose D'or Nominee 2019, Podcast of the Year 2018, Best Podcast ARIA's 2018.

"the pandemic's most important podcast" Telegraph



Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.

Support this show http://supporter.acast.com/griefcast.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
